name: Diorama (Stefenism)
description:
You’re trapped in a room and the only way out is to help your two dimensional friend find the key. Help him get to the key by re-arranging your three dimensional world to create a path through his dimension. You’ll have to push carts and move boxes to create platforms for him to stand on. Once you’ve created a path through the room you can control your two dimensional friend through a computer located inside the room. Once you’ve gotten the key you can move on to the next room.

3D controls: WASD to Move LMB to move boxes E to interact with computer and enter 2D world

2D controls: A and D to move left and Right SPACE bar to Jump E to re-enter 3D world

Created by: Zack Gilbertson Andrew Herbst Dillon Marchus Stefen Menzel
